replies.body:
The biggest letdown I've had this patch:
Discovering the (lack of) interaction between Ashe's Ranger's Focus and Runaan's Hurricane.

I put Runaans on her, hoping that it'd work the same way it does in League when interacting with her Rangers focus, launching a full barrage of extra Runaans bolts.

I was immensely disappointed to learn it didn't work that way in tft. :P
